item.title: Murder Most Actual
item.description: Speaking of [[books/proper english|sapphic murder house mysteries]], Alexis Hall has the contemporary version on lock. There are few things I like more than an established relationship romance—so very difficult to do well—and here it’s a marriage very naturally on the rocks for very relatable, natural reasons, just the living of life and complexities that ensue.
